location: Xingang Road Section 1, Lane 32 (新光路一段32巷), near Mucha MRT station (921m)
notes: Spacious 3BR/2BA unit on high floor with elevator, dual balconies, and full furnishings including appliances. Good natural light expected from dual balconies and high floor. For baby safety, verify balcony railing heights and gaps; no pets allowed which keeps space clean. Management fee adds NT$5,400/month to total cost.
